title: Why is ahri getting another skin so quickly?

embed.description: This is a W ORK I N P ROGRESS POST. This is going to be a big one.][ Status: The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] To start the 5.16 PBE cycle we have a MASSIVE update! Continue reading for more information!

replies.body:
Hey CatSith - 

We felt Ahri was a strong candidate for Academy thematic that we wanted to create.

That said, if we feel a champion fits in well with a theme we're creating, them having a fairly recent skin wouldn't exempt them. For example, we did something similar with Soraka where we released her Reaper skin in October, and then in April, released Order of the Banana because we felt this April Fools' skin fit in really well with the set coming out.
Thematic wise i think {{champion:61}} would have been a better candidate, her ball being a globe.
Ori has enough skins and she got a skin around the same time as Ahri and I disagree on thematic fitting Ori.

But I thought Ahri wasn't getting a pool party skin because riot didnt want her looking like a generic anime character, but now shes just getting a school-girl outfit. One that kinda makes her look like a generic anime character.
She even has that bright red hair that you only really see in anime.

They didn't give Ahri a pool party skin, cause they don't want to do a human female in a bikini skin, notice how Leona is the only human female out of the ten. I do agree that the new look is a generic school girl look and i don't much like it.
I'm glad you kept lady {{champion:421}} in mind.
Say it with me now, "Human Females."

We didn't want Ahri in just a bathing suit, and we always have clarity discussions around what can and cannot be changed in her kit. Those were the main issues we struggled with when running through some idea for how to make a Pool Party Ahri work; it wasn't the problem of 'oh, she looks too much like an anime character.' While I don't think it's impossible to create a Pool Party Ahri, we found there were better hooks for other champions this time around.

If that was your concern, why not give her an Atlantean skin, with free flowing robes made of seaweed?

Her W orbs could be water ballons, (think PP Ziggs)
and her Q the same as Syndra's.

I think that's an awesome possibility for Ahri in the future. However, it's not directly in line with Pool Party, which is why it wouldn't have shipped with Pool Party Zac, etc. 

We'd definitely need to keep Syndra's (Q)'s much different from Ahri's, but I get what you're saying. The watery orb could work super well with an Atlantean-themed Ahri.

We don't have plans to change how the text is. The discussion of adding combo 1, 2, and 3 were discussed, but we ultimately decided against it. They were a tad noisy, and it would be frustrating if you were slightly off from getting combo 3. 

The K.O. is meant to be for her, similar to how Arcade Sona has 'Game Over' appear on her body when she dies. We don't have plans to add it anywhere else - especially when Riven usually racks up a lot of kills. :P 

Arcade isn't just about bright colors and rainbows, it's about bringing retro games into a thematic. :D 

You'll have to wait and see as far as if there's any else coming down the line soon, event, or teaser-wise.

Hiya!

- Twitch did recently get a skin (I'm sorry if you're not a fan of it).
- Twisted Fate also just received a skin.
- Skarner's last skin was in April, so he recently just got one. 
- SKT Zyra came out a little over a year ago, so she's getting close to needing a new skin. 
- Lissandra's last skin was also a little over a year ago..
- Evelynn needs some form of update before we can give her a skin she truly deserves. 
- Cassiopeia has chromas coming out (but yes, she needs a new skin). 

to address your Taric question separately, he'c receiving a large scale re-work, which means you'll see a new splash him once the update is complete! 

TL;DR - we're working with 126 champions, so it takes us a bit of time to get through everyone and make sure they have a skin that works from them. Buuuut, we do keep track of which champions just had a skin, and which need one, as well as which champions we can't touch due to champion updates.
